caption: A man walks through a seemingly abandoned building covered in graffiti. As a star emerges, he descends a staircase littered with rubble. He uses spray paint to leave messages on the walls while narrating his journey. He continues to navigate through the abandoned hallway, pausing to spray more graffiti. Sunlight pours in from outside, illuminating his path. The man exits the building, and as he does, a massive explosion obliterates the structure behind him, kicking up a cloud of dust. This transition leads to a view of the Milky Way. The man then boards a mining cart and enters a dark tunnel, using a flashlight to illuminate the rocky interior. Returning to daylight, he extracts a piece of gold. Finally, he moves indoors to play the piano, sitting on a bench.
